projects.title: Sobat Takwa
projects.description: A web app offers a user-friendly interface with access to prayer schedules, Quran reading with audio support, and daily prayers, all with a search function...

details.description: Sobat Takwa Is a web app providing prayer schedules, Quran reading with audio, and daily prayers with search functionality, designed for ease and convenience.
features: Search and select a city to view prayer times.
Prayer times based on the selected location.
Search for verse by verse name.
Listen to the audio of each verse.
daily prayer list.
Search for prayers by prayer name.

projects.title: Cihuy Movie
projects.description: Cihuy Movie is a web app for discovering and organizing popular movies and TV shows, featuring daily and weekly trending lists. Built with TypeScript, React-router, Vite, and ChakraUI, it includes discovery pages with pagination...

details.description: Cihuy Movie is a web app for discovering and organizing popular movies and TV shows, featuring daily and weekly trending lists. Built with TypeScript, React-router, Vite, and ChakraUI, it includes discovery pages with pagination, a search function, and Firebase Authentication, allowing users to create a personalized watchlist.
features: Trending Lists: Daily/weekly popular movies and shows.
Discovery Pages: Browse content with pagination.
Search: Quickly find movies or shows.
Watchlist: Save favorites to a personalized list.

projects.title: Saas NotesApp
projects.description: This SaaS app lets users manage notes and subscribe to premium services. Free users can create up to 5 notes before needing a subscription. Key features include a Stripe Customer Portal, Stripe Checkout, server-side...

details.description: This project is a SaaS application built with a modern tech stack including Next.js 14, Stripe for payments, Kinde for authentication, Prisma for database management, Supabase for backend functionality, and Tailwind CSS for styling. The application allows users to subscribe to premium services and manage their notes. Free-tier users are limited to creating a maximum of 5 notes, after which they need to subscribe for unlimited access.
features: CRUD for Notes (Add, View, Edit, Delete Notes)
Server-side Implementation
Stripe Customer Portal
theme color can be customized

education.institution: State Islamic University of Imam Bonjol Padang
education.description: Relevant Coursework: Data structures, algorithms, software engineering, databases, and UI/UX design.

I took a course at Dicoding Academy to learn how to create web apps. For my final project, I made a web-based to-do list and note application. I also learned how to make web apps that are responsive, scalable, and secure.
